sentences.sContent: Get ready to savor those bonito flakes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Get ready to savor those bonito flakes.
sentences.sCn: 准备好去体味那些鲣鱼薄片。

sentences.sContent: The most common types of fish used are sea beam, tuna, and bonito.
sentences.sContent_eng: The most common types of fish used are sea beam, tuna, and bonito.
sentences.sCn: 生鱼片里使用的主要是大头鱼、金枪鱼和鲣鱼。

sentences.sContent: It is first boiled, and then dipped in a soup made of soy sauce, salt, sweet sake, and bonito shavings as it is being eaten.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is first boiled, and then dipped in a soup made of soy sauce, salt, sweet sake, and bonito shavings as it is being eaten.
sentences.sCn: 吃荞麦面条时先煮熟，然后蘸上由酱油、盐、甜酒和鲣鱼干做成的汤汁。

trans.tranOther: any of various small tunny-like marine food fishes of the genus Sarda, of warm Atlantic and Pacific waters: family Scombridae (tunnies and mackerels)
